amendment.description: To establish a national commission on policies and practices on the treatment of detainees since September 11, 2001.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2430 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 309.

action.text: Amendment SA 2430 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S12393-12395) To establish a national commission on policies and practices on the treatment of detainees since September 11, 2001.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2430 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 309.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2430 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 309.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2430 proposed by Senator Levin.
